title: The Legend of John Henry: an American folk tale
creator_credit: Pyramid Films, Nick Bosustow, David Adams and Sam Weiss
brief_description: Animated folk tale about John Henry, an African American, and his endeavour to cut a railroad tunnel through a mountain. Sung by Roberta Flack.
